data.name: Heart Inside
data.detailed_description:
Explore a large city's district as a young doctor. Help people free of charge, or achieve your goals by any means. Allocate resources as your honor means allows it. But keep in mind that saving everyone who is in need may be difficult. Learn how to create cures or become a skilled manipulator. Break curfew by outrunning the prosecutors or going undetected. Survive and help others to survive in a world of cyberpunk dictatorship and quarantine.

Features:

  • Large city exploration area
  • Game-affecting decision-making
  • Multiple endings
data.about_the_game:
Explore a large city's district as a young doctor. Help people free of charge, or achieve your goals by any means. Allocate resources as your honor means allows it. But keep in mind that saving everyone who is in need may be difficult. Learn how to create cures or become a skilled manipulator. Break curfew by outrunning the prosecutors or going undetected. Survive and help others to survive in a world of cyberpunk dictatorship and quarantine.

Features:

  • Large city exploration area
  • Game-affecting decision-making
  • Multiple endings
data.short_description: You have been given the power to heal people. But resources are limited, allocate them wisely. Walk your unique path as a young doctor in the brutal world of the ruling dictatorship.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4690
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 7100 / AMD 3500X
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
